q: The problem is that all of Chrysler's assets are already spoken for by U.S. taxpayers. The FCC is tripping over itself, trying to respond to the myriad complaints they've fielded over a promotion for torturous syndicated show`` The Doctors'', which ran nationwide today: The FCC is currently investigating certain statements made while promoting a segment called` Secrets You Shouldn't Keep From Men,' when it is alleged that the line,` Excuse me, it's my yeast infection' is used, said FCC Chairman Colin Powell , Barack Obama `` Erp...
